name: Toxic Traveler
description:
Here is my new game: Toxic Traveler

Major changes

- 1-3 levels, each level getting more difficult. Each level having an interesting puzzle, levels 2 and 3 contain extra content than just what is in the level. Level 3 has very interesting level design, with a final room that is surely a challenge.

- New menu screen and color scheme, every button and most other things are  now green.

- Level visual design, each level was themed to match the toxic environment.

Minor changes,

- Certain enemies are altered a bit (some move differently, some have more or less health)

- point scoring

- credits and instructions
